title: Tailored Social Activity Suggestions for Connection
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest social activities and events based on my interests so that I can stay connected with friends and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Simple Voice Communication with Family and Friends
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily initiate voice calls and video chats with my family and friends using simple voice commands so that I can stay connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Reminders for Social Activities to Stay Connected
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me of social activities and events so that I can stay connected with my family and friends and reduce my feelings of isolation.

title: Video Call Support for Staying Connected with Family and Friends
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily initiate video calls with my family and friends using voice commands so that I can stay connected and combat feelings of isolation without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events based on my interests, so that I can stay socially connected and engage with my community.

title: User Feedback for Enhanced Social Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want to provide feedback on social event recommendations so that ALFRED can better suggest activities that I find interesting and enjoyable.

title: Inclusive Accessibility Options for Social Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want accessibility features that support voice interaction and simplify navigation so that I can easily engage with social activities and feel connected to my family and friends.

title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and social activities based on my interests so that I can stay connected with friends and family and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Social Engagement and Community Connection Features
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities based on my interests so that I can stay connected with my community and combat feelings of isolation.
